featured.text: Chinese writer Lu Yu wrote in A.D. 780 that there were “tens of thousands” of teas.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於烹飪的液體，通常由水和調味料組成，用來煮食物或作為湯底。
definition.en_def: A liquid used in cooking, typically made from water and seasonings, used to cook food or as a base for soups.
definition.example: She prepared a delicious broth to simmer the vegetables.
